languages.text: "И вас устраивает жизнь, полная бессмысленности и тоски? Быть может, пришло время обратиться к вере, сестра?"

traits.locale_text: "И вас устраивает жизнь, полная бессмысленности и тоски? Быть может, пришло время обратиться к вере, сестра?"

languages.text: "And what you want is a life that is meaningless and full of despair? Perhaps it is time you turned to faith, sister?"
languages.original_text: "И вас устраивает жизнь, полная бессмысленности и тоски? Быть может, пришло время обратиться к вере, сестра?"

traits.locale_text: "And what you want is a life that is meaningless and full of despair? Perhaps it is time you turned to faith, sister?"
"And what you want is a life that is meaningless and full of despair? Perhaps it is time you turned to faith, sister?"
"And what you want is a life that is meaningless and full of despair? Perhaps it is time you turned to faith, sister?"
"And what you want is a life that is meaningless and full of despair? Perhaps it is time you turned to faith, sister?"

languages.text: “难道你想要的只是这毫无意义、充满绝望的生活吗？或许是时候拾起信仰了。你说呢，姐妹？”
languages.original_text: "And what you want is a life that is meaningless and full of despair? Perhaps it is time you turned to faith, sister?"

traits.locale_text: “难道你想要的只是这毫无意义、充满绝望的生活吗？或许是时候拾起信仰了。你说呢，姐妹？”

languages.text: «¿Y lo que quiere es una vida sin sentido y llena de sufrimiento? Quizá sea hora de que recurra a la fe, hermana».
languages.original_text: "And what you want is a life that is meaningless and full of despair? Perhaps it is time you turned to faith, sister?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y lo que quiere es una vida sin sentido y llena de sufrimiento? Quizá sea hora de que recurra a la fe, hermana».

languages.text: 「無意味で絶望に満ちた人生に何を求めるのだ？信念に生きる時が来たのではないかな？」
languages.original_text: "And what you want is a life that is meaningless and full of despair? Perhaps it is time you turned to faith, sister?"

traits.locale_text: 「無意味で絶望に満ちた人生に何を求めるのだ？信念に生きる時が来たのではないかな？」

languages.text: « À quoi bon vous complaire dans le désespoir d'une existence vide de sens ? Avez-vous songé à entrer dans les ordres, ma sœur ? »
languages.original_text: "And what you want is a life that is meaningless and full of despair? Perhaps it is time you turned to faith, sister?"

traits.locale_text: « À quoi bon vous complaire dans le désespoir d'une existence vide de sens ? Avez-vous songé à entrer dans les ordres, ma sœur ? »

languages.text: "Ihr wollt also ein sinnloses Leben voller Verzweiflung? Vielleicht wäre es an der Zeit, dass Ihr Euch dem Glauben zuwendet, Schwester?"
languages.original_text: "And what you want is a life that is meaningless and full of despair? Perhaps it is time you turned to faith, sister?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt also ein sinnloses Leben voller Verzweiflung? Vielleicht wäre es an der Zeit, dass Ihr Euch dem Glauben zuwendet, Schwester?"

languages.text: "Yani asıl istediğin, anlamsız ve çaresizlikle dolu bir yaşam mı? Acaba çözüm imanda olabilir mi?"
languages.original_text: "And what you want is a life that is meaningless and full of despair? Perhaps it is time you turned to faith, sister?"

traits.locale_text: "Yani asıl istediğin, anlamsız ve çaresizlikle dolu bir yaşam mı? Acaba çözüm imanda olabilir mi?"
